author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GUSTY WINDS CONTINUE OVER BERMUDA AS IMELDA MOVES QUICKLY AWAY FROM THE ISLAND... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME EXTRATROPICAL LATER TODAY...
summary: ...GUSTY WINDS CONTINUE OVER BERMUDA AS IMELDA MOVES QUICKLY AWAY FROM THE ISLAND... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME EXTRATROPICAL LATER TODAY... As of 8:00 AM AST Thu Oct 02 the center of Imelda was located near 32.9, -60.9 with movement ENE at 30 mph. The minimum central pressure was 979 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GUSTY WINDS CONTINUE OVER BERMUDA AS IMELDA MOVES QUICKLY AWAY FROM THE ISLAND... ...EXPECTED TO BECOME EXTRATROPICAL LATER TODAY... title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
